name: Pumpkin Pie Cheesecake Dip
description: A delicious  pumpkin pie  made easy with those vannila pudding and extract ,with that cream cheese to give it that creamy taste ,enjoy the delicious pumpkin pie

ingredients.name: Cream Cheese, softened at room temperature

steps:
1) In a bowl, using a handheld electric whisk, cream together the cream cheese and powdered sugar, then add in the pumpkin puree, pudding powder, pumpkin pie spice and cool whip and whisk until thoroughly combined.

2) Pop it in the fridge to set for about an hour then serve with cookies and apple slices.
